exceptions.tactic: apply const_u_square with (m:=l) (k':=l) (w:=w) (f:=fun i => power (S i) 2) in H19.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> u * u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r) + ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r))" on hypothesis of type "u * u = u1 + u2".

Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (r n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat) (g : nat -> nat), 2 <= r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) -> n = m /\\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i)" on hypothesis of type "∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) + ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) + (power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) + 0))) = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2))".

original: symmetry. apply const_u_square with (m:=l) (k':=l) (w:=w) (f:=fun i => power (S i) 2) in H19. symmetry in H19. apply sum_powers_injective in H19 as [-> _].
